nodes.text: Bansche Tech, also known as Banche Tech, was a major megacorporation with diverse holdings headquartered on the planet Chamble. They were also know to produce matrixes and mission specific components for the underground assassin droid market. After the Battle of Yavin, Bansche Tech was nationalized by the Galactic Empire. Alongside Sencil Corporation, Reiber Manufacturing, and SGI Systems, Inc., Bansche Tech was reformed into the Imperial Droid Corporation.
